text: The 2017 Rally Catalunya was the eleventh round of the 2017 World Rally Championship and was the 53rd running of the Rally de España. The rally was won by Kris Meeke and Paul Nagle, their fifth win in the World Rally Championship and first win on tarmac. Teemu Suninen and Mikko Markkula won the WRC-2 category, their first win of the season. ==Entry list== {| | {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="font-size: 85%" ! scope=row colspan="7" style="text-align: center;" | Notable entrants |- !
